title: Papaya Surprise Smoothie
paragraphe: Papaya's sunny flavor is a great addition to banana and strawberry, the traditional smoothie favorites.
steps: blend the papaya, banana, strawberries, milk, sugar, and ice cubes until smooth
nutrition: 228 calories; protein 2.9g; carbohydrates 55.1g; fat 1.3g; cholesterol 3.3mg; sodium 24.9mg.

title: Grapefruit Smoothie
paragraphe: A healthy, easy, and satisfying smoothie for those who enjoy grapefruit or are looking for a drink that is lower in sugar and calories. This is loaded with taste and is good for you!
steps: and flax seeds in a blender or NutriBullet® until smooth
nutrition: 202 calories; protein 4.6g; carbohydrates 47.4g; fat 1g; sodium 39.4mg. Full Nutrition
